info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Encrypt the input array using a standard cryptographic hash algorithm.
[Parameters] - input measure type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are pairs of: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - output measure type : not used. - measure : input measure. - algorithm : possible values are 'md5', 'sha256', 'sha512'
[Return type] Binary-array.
[Examples] oph_encrypt('','',measure,'sha256')
